name: HuTOWN
description:
Created to celebrate the 30th Birthday of the PC Engine games console, HuTOWN is an interactive way to discover the world of PC Engine software.

HOW TO PLAY
The town comprises the main area - entering various doors will reveal rooms themed around a variety of HuCARD games. Each room contains a selection of icons that contain screenshots, game information and mini reviews when collected. Look out for extra objects that will also trigger room specific animations! There's also a bouncer guarding a door somewhere...

CONTROLS
Control is via cursor keys & space, or Xbox controller.

CREDITS
HuTOWN by Paul Weller/Sunteam 2017.
All images and audio are copyright their respective owners.
